name: Dude K
description: Jump between platforms as a wierd low poly dude in a 3D space and smash some other random low poly dudes for your living. Your main goal is collecting idiotic looking low poly heads because that's what the developer want you to do, and if you don't like it - I don't care (lol). Now, after you completely waisted 2 miniutes of your life reading this description, go download this game and give it 5 stars so that it'll get popular and more people will play it. Thanks for reading, now go and somehow enjoy this idiotic game!
